trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface for creating new Web site user accounts.
trans-unit.target: 提供用於建立新的網站使用者帳戶的使用者介面。

trans-unit.target: 本主題內容：

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control provides the user interface for the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> object that communicates with your Web site's user data store to create new user accounts in the data store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項提供的使用者介面<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>會與您的網站的使用者資料存放區資料存放區中建立新的使用者帳戶進行通訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> relies on the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> to create the user and disable them if necessary.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>依賴<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>來建立使用者，並且如有必要，停用它們。

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with ASP.NET login controls, you might find it helpful to read [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 登入控制項，您可能會覺得很有幫助讀取[ASP.NET 登入控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)才能繼續。

trans-unit.source: For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd).
trans-unit.target: 如需登入控制項及成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control will accept a user name and password from the Web site visitor.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項將會接受使用者名稱和密碼，來自網站訪客。

trans-unit.source: Based on the requirements of the site's <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> object, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control will optionally accept an email address, represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> property, and a password recovery confirmation question and answer, represented by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 根據站台的需求<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項將會選擇性地接受電子郵件地址，由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>屬性，以及密碼復原確認問題與解答，由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For a table showing all required and optional controls for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 資料表顯示的所有必要和選擇性控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A> is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> property is set in the application's Web.config file, you could potentially generate a password that does not pass the regular expression strength test.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>設`true`和<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>屬性已設定應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中，您可能無法產生密碼未通過規則運算式強度測試。

trans-unit.source: In this case, creating a user raises an error that indicates an invalid password.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，建立使用者，會引發錯誤，指出密碼無效。

trans-unit.source: Creating a User
trans-unit.target: 建立使用者

trans-unit.source: When a user is created with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, the control interacts with the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> to accomplish the following tasks in order.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者建立與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>，與目前互動控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>來完成下列工作順序。

trans-unit.source: Create a password if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 建立密碼，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>設`true`。

trans-unit.source: Create the user in the data store that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> represents.
trans-unit.target: 在資料存放區中建立使用者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>代表。

trans-unit.source: Disable the user in the store if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A> property is set to `true.`
trans-unit.target: 停用存放區中的使用者，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A>屬性設定為 `true.`

trans-unit.source: You can extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control to accept additional information by adding additional fields, or by adding additional steps before or after the provided templates in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項來加入其他欄位，或加入額外的步驟之前或之後在提供的範本接受其他資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> step is the first step within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, and is a required step.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep>步驟是中的第一個步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項，然後是必要的步驟。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A> property is set to `false` to keep the user from returning to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> step and accidentally attempting to create another user account with the same credentials.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A>屬性設定為`false`讓使用者從返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep>步驟並不小心嘗試使用相同的認證建立另一個使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A> property is not maintained in view state and you must include logic in your application to maintain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>設`false`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A>屬性不會保留在檢視狀態，而且必須維護應用程式中包含邏輯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control properties represented by text boxes, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>, are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> 控制由文字方塊中，例如屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>，都可以存取頁面生命週期的所有階段。

trans-unit.source: The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged> event raised by the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 藉由使用者所做的任何變更會採用控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>文字方塊中所引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control can optionally send email messages to new users if you have configured an SMTP mail server to send email.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項可以選擇性地傳送電子郵件訊息給新使用者如果您已設定 SMTP 郵件伺服器傳送電子郵件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> 屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control uses Internet email services to send login information to users.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項使用網際網路電子郵件服務登入資訊傳送給使用者。

trans-unit.source: There are inherent security risks with sending passwords in email.
trans-unit.target: 沒有固有的安全性風險，傳送電子郵件中的密碼。

trans-unit.source: You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site.
trans-unit.target: 您應該判斷是否可以接受您的網站將這些安全性風險。

trans-unit.source: Styles and Templates
trans-unit.target: 樣式和範本

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control is not customized with templates, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control applies to the first text box in the control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property, which is applied to all text boxes of the control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項未自訂範本，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項套用至控制項中的第一個文字方塊和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>屬性會套用到所有文字方塊控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control is customized with templates, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項自訂範本，然後在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: In this case, directly set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property of each template child control.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，直接設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>每個範本子控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control properties represented by text boxes, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A>, are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> 控制由文字方塊中，例如屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A>，都可以存取頁面生命週期的所有階段。

trans-unit.source: The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged> event raised by the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 藉由使用者所做的任何變更會採用控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>文字方塊中所引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> property recreates the child controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, and their control state is lost in the process.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>屬性重新建立的子控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項和其控制項中處理程序將會遺失狀態。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this situation, explicitly maintain the control state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control's child controls, or avoid putting controls inside of templates.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這種情況下，明確地維持控制項狀態的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項的子控制項，或避免讓範本內部的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制樣式屬性，並說明每個樣式屬性會影響哪些 UI 項目。

trans-unit.source: For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如需哪些屬性的每個樣式套用至清單，請參閱個別的樣式屬性的文件。

trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性

trans-unit.target: 連結至其他網頁。

trans-unit.target: 告訴使用者如何使用控制項的頁面上的指示文字。

trans-unit.source: Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 所有輸入的欄位，例如文字方塊的標籤。

trans-unit.source: Text entry input fields.
trans-unit.target: 文字項目輸入的欄位。

trans-unit.target: 每個檢視的標題文字。

trans-unit.target: 密碼復原或重設嘗試成功時，對使用者顯示的文字。

trans-unit.target: 當成員資格提供者無法建立新的使用者帳戶時，出現錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.target: 描述密碼需求的文字。

trans-unit.source: Validation Grouping
trans-unit.target: 驗證群組

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control can be validated separately.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項使用的驗證群組，以便與相同的頁面上其他欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>個別驗證控制項。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control is used as the name of the validation group.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項當做驗證群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control with the ID "CreateUserWizard1" will use a validation group name of "CreateUserWizard1".
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>識別碼為"CreateUserWizard1"的控制項將會使用"CreateUserWizard1 」 的驗證群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: If you want to set the validation group that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control is part of, you must template the control and change the validation group name.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要設定的驗證群組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項是的一部分，您必須將控制項樣板和變更的驗證群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> class inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> class, which does not support special Microsoft Internet Explorer rendering for non-standard or quirks mode.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>類別繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>類別，不支援特殊的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 呈現的非標準或 quirks 模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> does not attempt to optimize rendering for non-standard Internet Explorer mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>不會嘗試最佳化的非標準的 Internet Explorer 模式呈現。

trans-unit.source: To get the best Internet Explorer rendering using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, use the XHTML doc type, which is added by default in Visual Web Developer and Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得最佳的 Internet Explorer 轉譯使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制，請使用 XHTML 文件類型，它會根據預設，Visual Web Developer 和 Visual Studio 中加入。

trans-unit.source: Formatting Using Layout Templates
trans-unit.target: 使用版面配置範本

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control lets you specify the layout of the control without requiring you to use an HTML `table` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項可讓您指定控制項的配置，而不需要您使用 HTML`table`項目。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can use a `LayoutTemplate` element to specify the layout.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您可以使用`LayoutTemplate`項目來指定版面配置。

trans-unit.source: In the layout template, you create placeholder controls to indicate where items should be dynamically inserted into the control.
trans-unit.target: 在版面配置範本中，您建立預留位置，表示其中的項目應該以動態方式插入控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: (This is similar to how the template model for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control works.) For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: (這是類似於如何範本模型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制運作。)如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 協助工具選項

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 宣告式語法

trans-unit.source: The first code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control in its basic form.
trans-unit.target: 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>其基本形式的控制。

trans-unit.source: This page will create a new Web site user account with the site's default <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: 此頁面將會建立新的網站使用者帳戶，站台的預設值<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>物件。

trans-unit.source: The second code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control with the default templates.

trans-unit.source: The third code example adds an additional step to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatedUser> event to store the user's first and last name in personalization properties.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the step that is currently displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前顯示給使用者的步驟。

trans-unit.source: The index of the step that is currently displayed to the user.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> property provides the zero-based index of the step that is currently displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>屬性提供之步驟的目前顯示在以零為起始的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> property to dynamically display a step to the user.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過程式設計方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>屬性以動態方式顯示給使用者的步驟。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end user's answer to the password recovery confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者對密碼復原確認問題的解答。

trans-unit.source: The end user's answer to the password recovery confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: 使用者對密碼復原確認問題的解答。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property will determine whether the question and answer text boxes are displayed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的成員資格提供者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性會決定是否在執行階段顯示的問題與解答文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: If an answer is required by the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property, then the answer text box will appear on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果回應中指定的成員資格提供者所需<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性，則 [回應] 文字方塊中會出現在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Each text box displayed on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在每個文字方塊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>與其相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example modifies the email message in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail> event to include the user's password recovery confirmation answer in the message that is sent to new users.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to automatically generate a password for the new user account.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否自動產生新使用者帳戶的密碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to automatically generate a password for the new user account; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示自動產生新使用者帳戶的密碼，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A> property makes it possible to create user accounts without entering a password for them.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>屬性讓您能夠建立使用者帳戶，而不需為他們輸入密碼。

trans-unit.source: For example, this functionality is useful when an administrator creates a new user's account and then gives a password to the user.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，這項功能時，系統管理員會建立新的使用者帳戶，並接著將密碼提供給使用者。

trans-unit.source: You cannot create users using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A> is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> property is set in the application's Web.config. An error message indicating an invalid password will result.
trans-unit.target: 您無法建立使用者使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>設`true`和<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>應用程式的 Web.config 中設定屬性。將會產生錯誤訊息，指出密碼無效。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the final user account creation step.
trans-unit.target: 取得最終使用者帳戶建立步驟的參考。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompleteWizardStep" /> object that represents the final user account creation step.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompleteWizardStep" /> 物件，表示最終使用者帳戶建立步驟。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A> property defines the final step for creating a user account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A>屬性會定義建立使用者帳戶的最後一個步驟。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompleteWizardStep> object that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompleteWizardStep>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A>傳回。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字，其顯示於成功建立網站使用者帳戶時。

trans-unit.source: The text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully.
trans-unit.target: 文字，其顯示於成功建立網站使用者帳戶時。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Your account has been successfully created."
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 [已經成功建立您的帳戶]。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteSuccessText%2A> property to change the message that is displayed when a user account is successfully created.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteSuccessText%2A>屬性變更時，已成功建立使用者帳戶會顯示訊息。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser%2A> method to change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteSuccessText%2A> property to include the user name in the displayed text.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser%2A>方法，以變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteSuccessText%2A>屬性要在顯示的文字中包含的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of the text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性集合的參考，這些屬性定義成功建立網站使用者帳戶時顯示的文字外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains properties that define the appearance of the text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully.
trans-unit.target: 包含屬性之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，這些屬性定義成功建立網站使用者帳戶時顯示的文字外觀。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteSuccessTextStyle%2A> defines the appearance of the text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteSuccessTextStyle%2A>定義網站的使用者帳戶建立在成功時所顯示的文字外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `CompleteSuccessTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>類別 (例如， `CompleteSuccessTextStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CompleteSuccessTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CompleteSuccessTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteSuccessTextStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of the text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully, after the user has clicked the **Continue** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A> step.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteSuccessTextStyle%2A>屬性定義的網站使用者帳戶已成功建立之後使用者已按一下, 時顯示的文字外觀**繼續**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>步驟。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteSuccessTextStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteSuccessTextStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteSuccessTextStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 在套用任何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteSuccessTextStyle%2A>屬性覆寫屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteSuccessTextStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>樣式屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteSuccessTextStyle%2A>設定：

trans-unit.source: However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteSuccessTextStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteSuccessTextStyle%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the second password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者輸入的第二個密碼。

trans-unit.source: The second password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 使用者輸入的第二個密碼。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A> property contains the second password (the confirmation password) entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A>屬性包含由使用者所輸入的第二個密碼 （確認密碼）。

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator> object is provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A> text box values.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>物件供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A>文字方塊值。

trans-unit.source: Each text box displayed on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control also has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在每個文字方塊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項也有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>與其相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message shown when the user enters two different passwords in the password and confirm password text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定錯誤訊息，其顯示於使用者在密碼和確認密碼文字方塊中輸入兩個不同的密碼時。

trans-unit.source: The error message shown when the user enters two different passwords in the password and confirm password text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息，其顯示於使用者在密碼和確認密碼文字方塊中輸入兩個不同的密碼時。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName" /> value of the **Continue** button on the final step for creating a user account.
trans-unit.target: 表示建立使用者帳戶之最後一個步驟上 [繼續] 按鈕的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonCommandName" /> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonCommandName" /> 欄位是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonCommandName> field represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> value of the **Continue** button on the final step for creating a user account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonCommandName>欄位代表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>值**繼續**按鈕上的使用者帳戶建立的最後一個步驟。

trans-unit.source: To assign continue functionality to any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property of the button to the string that is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonCommandName> field.
trans-unit.target: 若要指派繼續任何功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>中所包含的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>到字串中包含按鈕的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonCommandName>欄位。

trans-unit.source: The **Continue** button appears on the template for the final step for creating a user account, which is represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: **繼續**按鈕是否出現在 建立使用者帳戶，由表示的最終步驟範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the **Continue** button redirects the user to the URL that is stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 按一下**繼續**按鈕將使用者導向至的 URL 會儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To add custom functionality to the **Continue** button, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入自訂功能來**繼續**按鈕，建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image used for the **Continue** button on the final user account creation step.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定影像的 URL，用於最後一個使用者帳戶建立步驟上的 [繼續] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The URL of an image used for the **Continue** button on the final user account creation step.
trans-unit.target: 用於影像的 URL**繼續**最終的使用者帳戶建立步驟上的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image>, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonImageUrl%2A> property to specify the image to display for the **Continue** button.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image>，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要顯示之影像**繼續** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of the **Continue** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性集合的參考，這些屬性定義 [繼續] 按鈕的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains the properties that define the appearance of the **Continue** button.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，其中包含定義的外觀屬性**繼續** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property determines the appearance of the **Continue** button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, but you can override these settings using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性決定的外觀**繼續**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項，但是您可以覆寫這些設定，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `ContinueButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `ContinueButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ContinueButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `ContinueButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 在套用任何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonStyle%2A>屬性覆寫中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>樣式屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonStyle%2A>設定：

trans-unit.source: However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonStyle%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption displayed on the **Continue** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在 [繼續] 按鈕上的文字標題。

trans-unit.source: The text caption displayed on the **Continue** button.
trans-unit.target: 在顯示的文字標題**繼續** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Continue".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 [繼續]。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonText%2A> property contains the text displayed for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control's **Continue** button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonText%2A>屬性包含顯示的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項的**繼續** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonType%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonText%2A> property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image, or as the text of a link.
trans-unit.target: 值而定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonType%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonText%2A>屬性可顯示為文字的按鈕，以替代映像，或連結的文字顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonType%2A> property values and their respective effects on the **Continue** button's text caption.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonType%2A>屬性值和其各自效果**繼續**按鈕的文字標題。

trans-unit.source: Text appears on the button.
trans-unit.target: 文字會出現在按鈕上。

trans-unit.source: Text appears as alternative text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: Text appears as a link.
trans-unit.target: 文字會顯示為連結。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button rendered as the **Continue** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定呈現為 [繼續] 按鈕的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified button type is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的按鈕不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page that the user will see after clicking the **Continue** button on the success page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定網頁的 URL，使用者在按一下成功頁面上的 [繼續] 按鈕後會看到該網頁。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the destination page.
trans-unit.target: 目的頁的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A> property contains the URL of the Web page that the user will see after successfully completing registration on your site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A>屬性包含的使用者會看到已成功完成網站上的註冊之後的網頁 URL。

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A> property, you can control the first page that newly registered users see.
trans-unit.target: 藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A>屬性，您可以控制新註冊的使用者看到的第一頁。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A> property is <xref:System.String.Empty> and the user clicks the **Continue** button, the page is refreshed and any values on the form are cleared.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A>屬性是<xref:System.String.Empty>而且使用者按一下**繼續** 按鈕，在重新整理頁面，並已清除在表單上的任何值。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Called by the ASP.NET page framework to notify this control to create any child controls that it contains in preparation for posting back or rendering.
trans-unit.target: 由 ASP.NET 網頁架構呼叫以通知這個控制項要建立為準備回傳或轉譯而內含的任何子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the membership provider has created the new Web site user account.
trans-unit.target: 發生於成員資格提供者建立新的網站使用者帳戶之後。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatedUser> event is raised after the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property creates the new Web site user account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatedUser>中指定的成員資格提供者引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性會建立新的網站使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A> property is `true`, the user is logged on to the Web site after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatedUser> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>屬性是`true`，使用者登入後的網站<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatedUser>事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatedUser> event to set Web site values, such as personalization values, before the user is logged on to the site for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatedUser>事件以設定網站的值，例如個人化的值之前在使用者登入至站台的第一次。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image displayed for the **Create User** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 [建立使用者] 按鈕所顯示之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image displayed for the **Create User** button.
trans-unit.target: 顯示影像的 URL **Create User** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image>, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonImageUrl%2A> property to specify the image to display for the **Create User** button.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Image>，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要顯示之影像**Create User** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of the **Create User** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性集合的參考，這些屬性定義 [建立使用者] 按鈕的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains the properties that define the appearance of the **Create User** button.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，其中包含定義的外觀屬性**Create User** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of the **Create User** button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonStyle%2A>屬性定義的外觀**Create User**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CreateUserButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `CreateUserButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CreateUserButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CreateUserButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 在套用任何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonStyle%2A>屬性覆寫中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>樣式屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonStyle%2A>設定：

trans-unit.source: However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonStyle%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption displayed on the **Create User** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在 [建立使用者] 按鈕上的文字標題。

trans-unit.source: The text caption displayed on the **Create User** button for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在顯示的文字標題**Create User**按鈕<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" />控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Submit".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 [送出]。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonText%2A> property contains the text displayed for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control's **Create User** button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonText%2A>屬性包含顯示的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項的**Create User** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonType%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonText%2A> property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image, or as the text of a link.
trans-unit.target: 值而定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonType%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonText%2A>屬性可顯示為文字的按鈕，以替代映像，或連結的文字顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonType%2A> property values and their respective effects on the **Create User** button's text caption.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserButtonType%2A>屬性值和其各自效果**Create User**按鈕的文字標題。

trans-unit.source: Text appears on the button.
trans-unit.target: 文字會出現在按鈕上。

trans-unit.source: Text appears as alternative text for the image.
trans-unit.target: 文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: Text appears as a link.
trans-unit.target: 文字會顯示為連結。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The specified button type is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的按鈕不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button rendered as the **Create User** button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定呈現為 [建立使用者] 按鈕的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified button type is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的按鈕不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the membership provider cannot create the specified user account.
trans-unit.target: 發生於成員資格提供者無法建立指定的使用者帳戶時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError> event is raised on the server when the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property fails to create the specified user account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError>中指定的成員資格提供者時，將會引發在伺服器上的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性無法建立指定的使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: The error handler is passed a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus> object that contains the details of the failure from the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤處理常式會傳遞<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus>物件，其中包含從成員資格提供者失敗的詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: For a list of the possible error conditions, see <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可能的錯誤狀況的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the template for the user account creation step.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者帳戶建立步驟之樣板的參考。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep" /> value that represents the user account creation step.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep" /> 值，表示使用者帳戶建立步驟。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A> property defines the account creation step of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>屬性定義的帳戶建立步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> object that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>傳回。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the required and optional controls that are supported when using templated content for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出使用樣板化的內容時所支援的必要和選擇性控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>。

trans-unit.source: ID or command name
trans-unit.target: 識別碼或命令名稱

trans-unit.source: Control type
trans-unit.target: 控制項類型

trans-unit.source: Required/optional
trans-unit.target: 必要/選用

trans-unit.source: Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, or a custom or third-party control.
trans-unit.target: 實作的任何控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自訂或協力廠商控制項。

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: 必要

trans-unit.source: Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, or a custom or third-party control.
trans-unit.target: 實作的任何控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自訂或協力廠商控制項。

trans-unit.source: Required if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>設`false`。

trans-unit.source: Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, or a custom or third-party control.
trans-unit.target: 實作的任何控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自訂或協力廠商控制項。

trans-unit.source: Required if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> is `true.`
trans-unit.target: 若<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>是 `true.`

trans-unit.source: Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, or a custom or third-party control.
trans-unit.target: 實作的任何控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自訂或協力廠商控制項。

trans-unit.source: No requirements
trans-unit.target: 沒有需求

trans-unit.source: Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, or a custom or third-party control.
trans-unit.target: 實作的任何控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自訂或協力廠商控制項。

trans-unit.source: Optional unless required by membership.
trans-unit.target: 選擇項，除非所需的成員資格。

trans-unit.source: Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, or a custom or third-party control.
trans-unit.target: 實作的任何控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自訂或協力廠商控制項。

trans-unit.source: Optional unless required by membership.
trans-unit.target: 選擇項，除非所需的成員資格。

trans-unit.source: Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl>.
trans-unit.target: 實作的任何控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl>。

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: Any control that causes event bubbling
trans-unit.target: 造成事件反昇任何控制項

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: Any
trans-unit.target: 任何

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> property is set to `true` and you are using templated content, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> control is required; the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control throws an exception if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> control is not found or is of the wrong type.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>屬性設定為`true`，而且您使用樣板化的內容，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>控制項無須;<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項會擲回例外狀況，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>控制找不到，或是類型錯誤。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> is set to `false`, no exception is thrown if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> control is not found.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>設`false`，如果將會擲回任何例外狀況<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>找不到控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the control is of the wrong type, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項是錯誤的型別，則會忽略它。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if a membership provider requires a question and answer (determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionAndAnswerRequired%2A> property), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> controls are required and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> throws an exception if they are not found or are of the wrong type.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，如果成員資格提供者需要問題與解答 (取決於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionAndAnswerRequired%2A>屬性)，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>控制項所需和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>擲回例外狀況，如果找不到，或者屬於錯誤的類型。

trans-unit.source: If they are not required by the membership provider, no exception is thrown if they are not found, and if they are of the wrong type they are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果它們不需要的成員資格提供者，如果它們找不到，而且如果它們都是錯誤的型別便會予以忽略，會擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the membership provider is called to create the new Web site user account.
trans-unit.target: 發生於呼叫成員資格提供者以建立新的網站使用者帳戶之前。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser> event is raised prior to calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method on the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser>就會引發事件，然後才呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>方法中指定的成員資格提供者上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser> event to establish defaults or modify the information entered by the user before passing the information to the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser>事件，以建立預設值，或修改使用者輸入再將資訊傳遞至成員資格提供者的資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser> event to make the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A> property all lowercase before submitting it to the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser>事件進行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>屬性中指定的成員資格提供者來送出之前全部小寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the new user should be allowed to log on to the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該允許新的使用者登入網站。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the new user is allowed to log on to the Web site; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允許新的使用者登入網站則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A> property determines if the newly created user account will be marked as disabled in the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A>屬性會決定是否新建立的使用者帳戶將會標示為停用的成員資格資料存放區中。

trans-unit.source: When user accounts are marked as disabled, the accounts are not allowed to log on to the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者帳戶會標示為停用時，不允許帳戶登入網站。

trans-unit.source: For example, if your Web site allows new users to request an account, but requires administrative approval before allowing access, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A> property to `true` to disable newly created accounts until an administrator approves the account.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您的網站允許新的使用者要求的帳戶，但是需要系統管理核准才能存取，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A>屬性`true`停用新建立的帳戶，直到系統管理員核准的帳戶。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A> is `true`, you should set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A> property to `false` so that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> does not attempt to log on the new user.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A>是`true`，您應該設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>屬性`false`以便<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>不會嘗試將新的使用者登入。

trans-unit.source: If an email address is required by the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property, then the email address text box appears on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.

trans-unit.source: Each text box displayed on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在每個文字方塊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>與其相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a regular expression used to validate the provided email address.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定規則運算式，用於驗證提供的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the regular expression used to validate an email address.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含用來驗證電子郵件地址的規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpression%2A> property to specify a regular expression that validates the email address entered by the user to confirm that it matches a specific pattern.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpression%2A>使用者確認其符合特定模式所輸入的屬性來指定驗證電子郵件地址的規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: A common use is to make sure that the user has entered a complete email address, such as **user@contoso.com**. The regular expression is used in addition to any restrictions placed on the email address by the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 常見的用法是確定使用者已輸入的完整電子郵件地址，例如** user@contoso.com **。除了任何之限制電子郵件地址中指定的成員資格提供者所使用規則運算式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the membership provider rejects the email address for any reason, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidEmailErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果成員資格提供者會拒絕電子郵件地址，因為任何原因，文字會包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidEmailErrorMessage%2A>顯示屬性。

trans-unit.source: The address is only compared to the regular expression if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果只有位址比較的規則運算式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the email address does not pass the regular expression, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果電子郵件地址未通過的規則運算式，文字會包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>屬性顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: The following code example assigns a regular expression to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpression%2A> property to make sure that the user entered their email address in a valid format, such as **username@contoso.com**.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將指派的規則運算式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpression%2A>屬性，以確定使用者輸入的電子郵件地址格式無效，例如** username@contoso.com **。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message displayed when the entered email address does not pass the site's criteria for email addresses.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定錯誤訊息，其顯示於輸入的電子郵件地址未通過電子郵件地址網站準則的驗證時。

trans-unit.source: The error message displayed when the entered email address does not pass the regular expression defined in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpression" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 輸入電子郵件地址未通過中定義的規則運算式時顯示的錯誤訊息<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpression" />屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Please enter a different email address."
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 「 請輸入其他電子郵件地址。 」

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property to inform the user that the email address entered did not pass the site's criteria for email addresses.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>屬性來通知使用者輸入的電子郵件地址未通過電子郵件地址的站台的準則。

trans-unit.source: The following code example assigns an error message to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property to indicate to users that the email address is not in a valid format.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將指派的錯誤訊息至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>屬性，指出使用者電子郵件地址不是有效的格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message shown to the user when an email address is not entered in the email text box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定錯誤訊息，當未在電子郵件文字方塊中輸入電子郵件地址時顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: The error message shown to the user when an email address is not entered in the email text box.
trans-unit.target: 電子郵件地址不在電子郵件 文字方塊中輸入時，對使用者顯示錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Email is required."
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 「 電子郵件 」 所需。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of style properties that define the appearance of error messages.
trans-unit.target: 取得樣式屬性集合的參考，這些屬性定義錯誤訊息的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> containing the style properties that define the appearance of error messages on the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />，包含定義控制項上錯誤訊息外觀的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default is null.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 null。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ErrorMessageStyle%2A> property to change the appearance of error messages that are displayed when the membership provider fails to create a new user account.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ErrorMessageStyle%2A>来變更的成員資格提供者無法建立新的使用者帳戶時，會顯示錯誤訊息的外觀屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ErrorMessageStyle%2A> is set to display the following messages in red:
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ErrorMessageStyle%2A>設定以紅色顯示下列訊息：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ErrorMessageStyle%2A> property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ErrorMessageStyle%2A>屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `ErrorMessageStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>類別 (例如， `ErrorMessageStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ErrorMessageStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `ErrorMessageStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ErrorMessageStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ErrorMessageStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any settings that are applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ErrorMessageStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 會套用任何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ErrorMessageStyle%2A>屬性覆寫的屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ErrorMessageStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>樣式屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ErrorMessageStyle%2A>設定：

trans-unit.source: However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ErrorMessageStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ErrorMessageStyle%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。
