trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the Help page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定說明網頁的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the Help page.
trans-unit.target: 說明網頁的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of properties that define the appearance of hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性集合，這些屬性定義超連結的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains properties that define the appearance of hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 包含屬性之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，這些屬性定義超連結的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.HyperLinkStyle%2A> property gets a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that you use to change the appearance of hyperlinks in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.HyperLinkStyle%2A>屬性取得的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件，以便用來變更中的超連結外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.HyperLinkStyle%2A> property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.HyperLinkStyle%2A>屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `HyperLinkStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>類別 (例如， `HyperLinkStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HyperLinkStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `HyperLinkStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.HyperLinkStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.HyperLinkStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.HyperLinkStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 在套用任何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.HyperLinkStyle%2A>屬性覆寫的屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.HyperLinkStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>樣式屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.HyperLinkStyle%2A>設定：

trans-unit.source: However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.HyperLinkStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.HyperLinkStyle%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets instructions for creating a new user account.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定建立新使用者帳戶的指示。

trans-unit.source: The instruction text for creating a new user account.
trans-unit.target: 建立新使用者帳戶的指示文字。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionText%2A> property contains instructions for users creating a new user account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionText%2A>屬性包含建立新的使用者帳戶的使用者指示。

trans-unit.source: This text is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, following the title.
trans-unit.target: 此文字會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>下列標題的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionText%2A> property is set to an empty string (""), no instruction text is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionText%2A>屬性設定為空字串 ("")，沒有指示文字顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.target: 取得屬性集合的參考，這些屬性定義指示文字的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `InstructionTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `InstructionTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionTextStyle%2A>屬性定義的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message displayed when the password retrieval answer is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定訊息，其顯示於密碼擷取解答無效時。

trans-unit.source: The message displayed when the password retrieval answer is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 訊息，其顯示於密碼擷取解答無效時。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Please enter a different security answer."
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 [請輸入不同的安全性解答]。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property can support a question and answer for retrieving or resetting the user's password.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>中指定的類別成員資格提供者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性可以支援問題和解答擷取或重設使用者的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidAnswerErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed when the answer entered by the user does not meet the requirements for the answer set by the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidAnswerErrorMessage%2A>屬性會顯示使用者所輸入的答案不符合的需求設定成員資格提供者的回應時。

trans-unit.source: The actual requirements for the answer are determined by the membership provider, and might be different for different providers.
trans-unit.target: 實際需求的回應取決於成員資格提供者，而且可能會不同而不同的提供者。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example changes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidAnswerErrorMessage%2A> property for a membership provider that requires the answer to have a minimum length.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidAnswerErrorMessage%2A>成員資格提供者需要回答的最小長度屬性。

trans-unit.source: The actual membership provider is not shown.
trans-unit.target: 實際的成員資格提供者不會顯示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message displayed when the entered email address is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定訊息，其顯示於輸入的電子郵件地址無效時。

trans-unit.source: The message displayed when the email address entered is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的電子郵件地址不正確時顯示的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Please enter a valid email address."
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 「 請輸入有效的電子郵件地址。 」

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property can restrict the email addresses that it will accept.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>中指定的類別成員資格提供者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性可以限制就會接受電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidEmailErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed when the email address entered by the user does not meet the requirements for the email address set by the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidEmailErrorMessage%2A>屬性會顯示使用者所輸入的電子郵件地址不符合的需求設定成員資格提供者的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: The actual requirements for the email address are determined by the membership provider, and might be different for different providers.
trans-unit.target: 電子郵件地址的實際需求取決於成員資格提供者，並可能會不同而不同的提供者。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message displayed when the password entered is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定訊息，其顯示於輸入的密碼無效時。

trans-unit.source: The message displayed when the password entered is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 訊息，其顯示於輸入的密碼無效時。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Please enter a valid password."

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定訊息，其顯示於輸入的密碼擷取問題無效時。

trans-unit.source: The message displayed when the password retrieval question is not valid.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LabelStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of the following properties:

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LabelStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LabelStyle%2A>屬性會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LabelStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 在套用任何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LabelStyle%2A>屬性覆寫屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LabelStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>樣式屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LabelStyle%2A>設定：

trans-unit.source: However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LabelStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LabelStyle%2A>屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the control state to restore.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示要還原的控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the SaveViewState method.
trans-unit.target: 從 SaveViewState 方法所儲存的先前頁面要求來還原檢視狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="savedState" /> is not a valid <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="savedState" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to log in the new user after creating the user account.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在建立使用者帳戶後登入新的使用者。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the new user should be logged in after creating the user account; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該在建立使用者帳戶後登入新的使用者則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A> property can be set to `false` if you want to create a user account but not authenticate the account after it is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>屬性可以設定為`false`如果您想要建立使用者帳戶，但不是會在建立之後，驗證的帳戶。

trans-unit.source: This might be useful if you are an administrator creating user accounts, for example, or if there is a waiting period before users can access the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是建立使用者帳戶，例如，系統管理員，或如果使用者可以存取的網站之前的等待期間，這可能是很有用。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A> property is set to `true`, the user will be created and logged in at the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A> step.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>屬性設定為`true`，使用者會建立並登入的結尾<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>步驟。

trans-unit.source: If you want the user to be logged in after all the steps have been completed, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A> property to `false` until all of the steps of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control are completed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想讓使用者登入已完成所有步驟之後，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A>屬性`false`直到所有的步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項都已都完成。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the characteristics of the email message sent to new users.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性集合的參考，這些屬性定義傳送至新使用者之電子郵件訊息的特性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition" /> object that defines the email message sent to a new user.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition" />物件，定義電子郵件訊息傳送至新的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> property returns a reference to a group of properties that you use to define the format and content of the email message that is sent to new users.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>屬性會傳回一組您用來定義格式的屬性和內容傳送給新使用者的電子郵件訊息的參考。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include the subject line and the sender's return address.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括主旨和寄件者回覆地址。

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of properties, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需完整的屬性清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> class (for example, `MailDefinition-Subject`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>屬性在表單中以宣告方式`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>類別 (例如， `MailDefinition-Subject`)。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.SubProperty` (for example, `MailDefinition.Subject`).
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定屬性以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.SubProperty`(例如， `MailDefinition.Subject`)。

trans-unit.source: An email message is sent to new users only if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> is not `null` and if <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage.Body%2A> is not empty or `null`.
trans-unit.target: 電子郵件訊息傳送至新的使用者才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>不`null`如果<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage.Body%2A>不是空的或`null`。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail> event is raised and an attempt is made to send the email message.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail>就會引發事件，並嘗試傳送電子郵件訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From%2A> property must be set to an email address.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From%2A>屬性必須設定為電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.Web.HttpException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When the email message is created from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object, it will make the substitutions listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 從電子郵件訊息建立時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>物件，它會使下表所列的替代項目。

trans-unit.source: Substitution text
trans-unit.target: 替代文字

trans-unit.source: Replaced with
trans-unit.target: 取代為

trans-unit.source: The user name of the newly created user account.
trans-unit.target: 新建立的使用者帳戶的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The password for the newly created user account.
trans-unit.target: 新建立的使用者帳戶的密碼。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.IsBodyHtml%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object is `true`, the contents of the mail message will be HTML encoded to guard against cross-site scripting security vulnerabilities for the message recipient.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.IsBodyHtml%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>物件是`true`，郵件訊息的內容將會是 HTML 編碼的訊息收件者防止跨網站指令碼的安全性弱點。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A> method to modify the <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A>方法，以修改<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>物件。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an email message.
trans-unit.target: 不保證會接收使用者，或檢視電子郵件訊息。

trans-unit.source: To verify that a user has received a notification by email, consider providing a confirmation link in the email message that enables the user to confirm that the notification was received.
trans-unit.target: 若要確認使用者已收到通知，透過電子郵件，請考慮提供確認連結，可讓使用者確認收到通知的電子郵件訊息中。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>屬性可以使用宣告式和以程式設計方式的語法。

trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例需要名為 MailFile.txt 包含下列文字的文字檔案。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From" /> 未設為電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the membership provider called to create user accounts.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定成員資格提供者，可以呼叫它來建立使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> used to create user accounts.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立使用者帳戶的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property contains the name of the defined <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> class membership provider that is used to store the user information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性包含在定義的名稱<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>類別成員資格提供者用來儲存使用者資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can store membership information for users in different data stores by changing the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以變更的值不同的資料存放區中儲存的使用者成員資格資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property is set to <xref:System.String.Empty>, the default membership provider defined in the Web.config file is used.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.String.Empty>，會使用 Web.config 檔案中定義預設成員資格提供者。

trans-unit.source: Membership providers are defined in the Web.config file in the `<membership>` section.
trans-unit.target: 中的 Web.config 檔案中所定義的成員資格提供者`<membership>`> 一節。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例要求中所定義的成員資格提供者`<membership>`Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: For this example, each membership provider points to a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 此範例中，針對每個成員資格提供者會指向 SQL Server 資料庫。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會插入步驟，來判斷哪個部門組織的使用者所屬的使用者帳戶建立之前。

trans-unit.source: It then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> provider to the appropriate provider for that division.
trans-unit.target: 然後設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>該部門的適當的提供者的提供者。

trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the server control is passed up the page's UI server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 決定伺服器控制項的事件是否要在頁面的 UI 伺服器控制項階層架構中向上傳遞。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 布林值 (Boolean)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonClick" /> event when the user clicks the **Continue** button on the final user account creation step.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下最後一個使用者帳戶建立步驟上的 [繼續] 按鈕時，引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonClick" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonClick> event is raised when the user clicks the **Continue** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonClick>就會引發事件，當使用者按一下**繼續**按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnContinueButtonClick%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnContinueButtonClick%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnContinueButtonClick(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnContinueButtonClick(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnContinueButtonClick(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnContinueButtonClick(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatedUser" /> event after the membership provider creates the user account.
trans-unit.target: 在成員資格提供者建立使用者帳戶後，引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatedUser" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser%2A> method is called after the Web site user account is created by the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser%2A>網站使用者帳戶建立成員資格提供者之後，呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A> property is `true`, the user is logged in after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>屬性是`true`，使用者會登入之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser%2A> method to set Web site values, such as personalization properties, before the user is logged in for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser%2A>方法，以設定網站的值，例如個人化屬性，使用者第一次登入之前。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser(System.EventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser(System.EventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs" /> with the data for the event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs" />，包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError" /> event when there is a problem creating the specified user account.
trans-unit.target: 當建立指定的使用者帳戶出現問題時，引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreateUserError%2A> method is called when the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property returns an error message from creating the specified user account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreateUserError%2A>方法呼叫中指定的成員資格提供者時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性會傳回錯誤訊息，建立指定的使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs.CreateUserError%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter contains a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus> object that contains the details of the error.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs.CreateUserError%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs>物件傳遞為`e`參數包含<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus>物件，其中包含錯誤詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreateUserError%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreateUserError(System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreateUserError(System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs" /> containing the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser" /> event prior to calling the membership provider to create the new user account.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫成員資格提供者以建立新的使用者帳戶之前，引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatingUser%2A> method to do any processing required before sending the new user information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method of the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatingUser%2A>方法來執行動作傳送至新的使用者資訊之前所需的任何處理<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>方法中指定的成員資格提供者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might set the user name field to all lowercase letters, or compare the email address to a list of restricted addresses before allowing creation of the user account.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您可能會將使用者名稱欄位設為小寫字母，或比較之前允許的使用者帳戶建立電子郵件地址，以限制的地址清單。

trans-unit.source: If you need to cancel the request to create the new user account, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要取消的要求建立新的使用者帳戶、 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs>物件傳遞為`e`參數`true`。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail" /> event before an email message is sent to a new user.
trans-unit.target: 在將電子郵件訊息傳送至新使用者之前，引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A> method to modify the email message sent to new users.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A>方法，以修改傳送給新使用者的電子郵件訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs.Message%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter contains the <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> object that will be sent to the new user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs.Message%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs>物件傳遞為`e`參數包含<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>會傳送給新使用者的物件。

trans-unit.source: Modify the properties of the <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> object to modify the email message.
trans-unit.target: 修改的屬性<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>物件以修改電子郵件訊息。

trans-unit.source: Email messages are only created when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> object specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> property points to a valid file name.
trans-unit.target: 電子郵件訊息時，會只建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>所指定物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>屬性會指向有效的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會定義自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>使用控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A>方法，以修改傳送給新使用者的電子郵件文字。

trans-unit.source: This example requires a text file named MailFile.txt that contains the following text.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail(System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail(System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs" /> containing the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendMailError" /> event when email cannot be sent to the new user.
trans-unit.target: 當電子郵件無法傳送至新使用者時，引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendMailError" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendMailError%2A> method is called when the SMTP mail system raises an exception while attempting to send email to the new user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendMailError%2A> SMTP 郵件系統會引發例外狀況時傳送電子郵件給新使用者時，呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: Examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter to determine the actual cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>物件傳遞為`e`參數，來判斷實際造成例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The most common problem is a configuration error in the `<smtpMail>` section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 最常見的問題是中的組態錯誤`<smtpMail>`Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter to signal that the exception that caused the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendMailError%2A> method to be called has been taken care of, otherwise the exception is re-thrown.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>物件傳遞為`e`發出信號的例外狀況造成參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendMailError%2A>来呼叫的方法已被處理，否則是重新擲回例外狀況。
